mapper.select:
select
from np_fullbuy_reduce_marketing where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0' ORDER BY full_price
mapper.insert:
insert into np_fullbuy_reduce_marketing
fullbuy_reduct_marketing_id,
marketing_id,
full_price,
reduce_price,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update np_fullbuy_reduce_marketing
marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reduce_price = #{reducePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where fullbuy_reduct_marketing_id = #{fullbuyReductMarketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update np_fullbuy_reduce_marketing set del_flag ='1' where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update np_fullbuy_reduce_marketing
full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reduce_price = #{reducePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by full_price
